 Get particle id.
Check on particle charge
Parameters:
[in] pJet reference to non-modifiable fastjet::PseudoJet
Returns:
true if the corresponding particle is charged, false if it is neutral or has no ParticleInfo object attached.
Note:
`!isCharged(pJet) == isNeutral(pJet)` only if pJet is a fastjet::PseudoJet with a ParticleInfo object attached.

Number of charged particles
Calculates the number of charged/neutral particles in a list, optionally restricted to a given vertex.

Parameters:
[in] vJet reference to non-modifiable list of particles
inout] nJets number of charged/neutral particles found
[in] vtx consider only particles at vertex with this id (optional, default -1 means all vertices)
[in] type consider only particles from this collision type

Detailed Description

Collection of helper functions to determine features of the particle or jet represented by a fastjet::PseudoJet with an attached ParticleInfo object.
